Grouping.Group: Groups conditions or other groups together in an "all true" or "any one true" relationship

Personal.Age: Enter an age. Leave blank to find those without a DOB.
Personal.MaritalStatusId: Select Marital Status from the list.

Birthday.Title: Birthday
Birthday.ToolTip: MM/DD/YYYY or MM/DD or MM or YYYY

Personal.Birthday: Enter an exact date - Equal or Not Equal. (MM/DD/YYYY) or day of month (MM/DD) or month (MM) or year (YYYY)
Personal.BDate: Pick a date with a comparison.
Personal.DaysTillBirthday: Enter a number of days less than 365.
Personal.DaysTillAnniversary: Enter a number of days less than 365.
Personal.WeddingDate: Enter an exact date - Equal or Not Equal. (MM/DD/YYYY) or day of month (MM/DD) or month (MM) or year (YYYY)
Personal.Grade: Enter a number - grade or graduation year.
Personal.FirstName: Enter all or part of a First Name.
Personal.LastName: Enter all or part of a Last Name.
Personal.NickName: Enter all or part of Goes By Name.
Personal.MaidenName: Enter all or part of Maiden (Former) Name.
Personal.MiddleName: Enter all or part of Middle Name.
Personal.DeceasedDate: Pick a date with a comparison.
Personal.WidowedDate: Pick a date with a comparison.
Personal.EmailAddress: Enter any part of an email address. Searches on 1st email, both active and inactive.
Personal.EmailAddress2: Enter any part of an email address. Searches on 2nd email, both active and inactive.

Family.NumberOfFamilyMembers: Enter a number with a comparison.
Family.HasParents: Select True or False for children with a Primary Adult in the family.
Family.FamilyHasChildren: Select True or False for families with members aged 12 or under.
Family.FamilyHasChildrenAged: Enter an age for families with children that age or under.

FamilyHasChildrenAged3.Title: Family Has M/F Children Aged Range

Family.FamilyHasChildrenAged3: Enter an age range (ex. 12-13) and select a gender.
Family.IsHeadOfHousehold: Select True or False for those calculated as Head of Household.
Family.HasRelatedFamily: Select True or False for families with Family Relations.

FamHasPrimAdultChurchMemb.Title: Family Has Primary Adult Church Member

Family.FamHasPrimAdultChurchMemb: Select True or False for families with a Primary Adult who is a member of the church.
Family.FamilyId: Enter a Family ID number and select a comparison.

Address.Title: Address
Address.PrimaryResCode: Select Resident Code from the list.
Address.PrimaryZip: Enter all or part of a Zip for the Preferred Address and select a Comparison.
Address.PrimaryCity: Enter all or part of a City for a Preferred Address and select a Comparison.
Address.PrimaryAddress: Enter all or part of the 1st line of a Preferred Address.
Address.PrimaryAddress2: Enter all or part of the 2nd line of a Preferred Address.

ContactInfo.Title: Contact Info
ContactInfo.HomePhone: Enter all or part of Home Phone number. (no dashes)
ContactInfo.CellPhone: Enter all or part of Cell Phone number.
ContactInfo.WorkPhone: Enter all or part of Work Phone number.
ContactInfo.DoNotPublishPhones: Person has asked to not display phones on directories
ContactInfo.HasInvalidEmailAddress: Select True or False. Looks at both 1st and 2nd email addresses, whether active or not.
ContactInfo.SpouseHasEmail: Select True or False. Indicates Spouse Has an Email Address
ContactInfo.SendEmailAddress1: True or False, First Email Address is active or not
ContactInfo.SendEmailAddress2: True or False, Second Email Address is active or not
ContactInfo.ReceiveSms: Select True or False for those who have opted in for texting (SMS).

Ministry.HasTaskWithName: Enter all or part of the Task Name (leave blank for all) to find those whom the incomplete task is regarding.
Ministry.HasIncompleteTask: Enter all or part of the Task Name (leave blank for all) to find those who have not completed a delegated task.
Ministry.DaysSinceContact: Enter a number of days with a comparison to find those without a Contact during those days. Must have a previous Contact.
Ministry.RecentContactMinistry: Enter a number of days and select Ministry from the list.
Ministry.RecentContactType: Enter a number of days and select Contact Type from the list.
Ministry.RecentContactReason: Enter a number of days and select Contact Reason from the list.
Ministry.RecentEmailCount: Enter a number of days and number of emails along with a Comparison.
Ministry.MadeContactTypeAsOf: Select Contact Type from the list and pick the date range.
Ministry.HasContacts: Select True or False to find anyone who has received a Contact.
Ministry.ChristAsSavior: Select True or False for those with this checkbox flagged on their Growth tab.
Ministry.InfoBecomeAChristian: Select True or False for those with this checkbox flagged on their Growth tab.
Ministry.InterestedInJoining: Select True or False for those with this checkbox flagged on their Growth tab.
Ministry.PleaseVisit: Select True or False for those with this checkbox flagged on their Growth tab.

Membership.MemberStatusId: Select Member Status from the list.
Membership.DecisionDate: Select Comparison and pick the date.
Membership.DecisionTypeId: Select Decision Type from the list.
Membership.RecentDecisionType: Select Decision Type from the list and enter the number of days to look back.
Membership.RecentJoinChurch: Select True or False and enter the number of days to look back.
Membership.JoinDate: Pick the date and the Comparison. Leave date blank for those without a Join Date.
Membership.JoinCodeId: Select Join Type from the list.
Membership.DropDate: Pick the date and the Comparison. Leave date blank for those without a Drop Date.
Membership.DropCodeId: Select Drop Type from the list.
Membership.BaptismDate: Pick the date and the Comparison. Leave date blank for those without a Baptism Date.
Membership.BaptismTypeId: Select Baptism Type from the list.
Membership.BaptismSchedDate: Pick the date and the Comparison. Leave date blank for those without a Scheduled Date for Baptism.
Membership.BaptismStatusId: Select Baptism Status from the list.
Membership.NewMemberClassDate: Pick the date and the Comparison. Leave date blank for those without a New Member Class Date.
Membership.NewMemberClassStatusId: Select New Member Class Status from the list.
Membership.LetterDateRequested: Pick the date and the Comparison. Leave date blank for those without a Letter Requested Date.
Membership.LetterStatusId: Select Letter Status from the list.

CurrentEnrollments.Title: Enrollments
CurrentEnrollments.InBFClass: Select True or False for those currently enrolled in a Main Fellowship class.
CurrentEnrollments.IsMemberOf: Select Program/Division/Organization from the list for current members.
CurrentEnrollments.MemberTypeCodes: Select Member Type from the list and select other options: Program/Division/Organization, Org Type, Schedule, Campus.
CurrentEnrollments.AttendTypeCodes: Select Attend Type from the list and select other options: Program/Division/Organization, Org Type, Schedule, Campus.
CurrentEnrollments.MembOfOrgWithCampus: Select Campus from the list and select Program/Division/Organization.
CurrentEnrollments.MembOfOrgWithSched: Select Schedule from the list and select Program/Division/Organization.
CurrentEnrollments.RecentRegistrationType: Select Registration Type from the list, enter the number of days to look back and select options: Program/Division/Organization, Org Type.
CurrentEnrollments.SmallGroup: Enter all of part of a Small Group name, select a Comparison and select Program/Division/Organization.
CurrentEnrollments.NumberOfMemberships: Enter a number of Enrollments, select a Comparison and select Program/Division/Organization.

EnrollmentHistory.Title: Enrollment History
EnrollmentHistory.WasMemberAsOf: Pick the date range and select Program/Division/ Organization, Org Type.
EnrollmentHistory.MemberTypeAsOf: Select Member Type from the list, pick a date range and select other options: Program/Division/Organization, Org Type.
EnrollmentHistory.IsPendingMemberOf: Select Program/Division/Organization from the list and specify True or False.
EnrollmentHistory.IsInactiveMemberOf: Select Program/Division/Organization from the list and specify True or False.
EnrollmentHistory.OrgJoinDate: Pick the Date and Comparison and select Program/Division/Organization.
EnrollmentHistory.OrgJoinDateDaysAgo: Enter the number of days to look back and select the Comparison and select Program/Division/Organization.
EnrollmentHistory.OrgInactiveDate: Pick the Inactive Date (in the Member Dialog) and Comparison and select Program/Division/Organization.

OrgJoinDateCompare.Title: Org Join Date Compared to Field

EnrollmentHistory.OrgJoinDateCompare: Select the Compared to Field from the list along with a Comparison and select Program/Division/Organization.

CurrentOrg.Title: Current Org
CurrentOrg.HasBalanceInCurrentOrg: Select True or False for Members with a Balance in the last organization you viewed.
CurrentOrg.InCurrentOrg: Select True or False for Members of the last organization you viewed.
CurrentOrg.InactiveCurrentOrg: Select True or False for Inactive Members of the last organization you viewed.
CurrentOrg.PendingCurrentOrg: Select True or False for Pending Members of the last organization you viewed.
CurrentOrg.PreviousCurrentOrg: Select True or False for Previous Members of the last organization you viewed.
CurrentOrg.VisitedCurrentOrg: Specify True or False for Guests in Current Organization.
CurrentOrg.LeadersUnderCurrentOrg: Select True or False for Leaders of the last organization you viewed and any Leaders in any Child Organization under that org.
CurrentOrg.MembersUnderCurrentOrg: Select True or False for Members of the last organization you viewed and any Members in any Child Organization under that org.

Volunteer.VolunteerApprovalCode: Select Approval Code from the list.
Volunteer.VolAppStatusCode: Select Volunteer Application Status from the list.
Volunteer.VolunteerProcessedDateMonthsAgo: Enter the number of months to look back for approval.
Volunteer.PmmBackgroundCheckStatus: Select the Protect My Ministry status from the list, select the Label from the list, if you use Labels and enter the username or People ID number of the person making the background check.

Attendance.Title: Recent Attendance
Attendance.RecentAttendMemberType: Select Member Type from the list, enter a number of days to look back and select Program/Division/Organization.
Attendance.VisitNumber: Pick a date and Comparison and enter the number of visits.
Attendance.RecentVisitNumber: Specify True or False, enter the number of days to look back and enter the number of visits.
Attendance.RecentAttendType: Select Attendance Type from the list, enter the number of days to look back and select other options: Program/Division/Organization, Org Type.
Attendance.AttendPct: Enter a number for the Attendance Percentage and select Program/Division/Organization.
Attendance.RecentAttendCount: Enter a number and select Comparison for the Attendance Count, enter a number for the days to look back and select other options: Program/Division/Organization, Org Type.
Attendance.RecentAttendCountAttCred: Enter a number and select Comparison for the Attendance Count, enter a number for the days to look back, enter the Attend Credit ID number, select other options: Program/Division/Organization, Schedule.

RecentNewVisitCount.Title: Recent New Visit Count
RecentNewVisitCount.QuartersLabel: Number of days for no attendance

Attendance.RecentNewVisitCount: Enter a number and select Comparison for the Visit Count, enter a number for the days to look back, enter the number of days with no attendance, select other options: Program/Division/Organization, Org Type.
Attendance.KidsRecentAttendCount: Enter a number and select a Comparison for the Attendance Count for children 12 and under and enter a number of days to look back.

AttendanceHistory.Title: Attendance Dates
AttendanceHistory.AttendMemberTypeAsOf: Select Member Type from the list, pick a date range and select Program/Division/Organization.
AttendanceHistory.AttendTypeAsOf: Select Attendance Type from the list, pick a date range and select Program/Division/Organization.
AttendanceHistory.AttendPctHistory: Enter the number for the percentage and select a Comparison, pick a date range and select Program/Division/Organization.
AttendanceHistory.AttendCntHistory: Enter a number and select Comparison for the Attendance Count, pick a date range and select other options: Program/Division/Organization, Schedule.
AttendanceHistory.DaysBetween12Attendance: Enter a number and select the Comparison for the number of Days between 1st and 2nd Attendance, enter a number of days to look back, select Program/Division/Organization.
AttendanceHistory.DaysAfterNthVisitDateRange: Enter a number and select the Comparison for the number of days after the Nth Attendance, enter a number for the Nth Attendance, pick a date range and select Program/Division/Organization.
AttendanceHistory.GuestAsOf: Choose a starting date/time and ending date/time, then pick a Program/Division/Organization
AttendanceHistory.AttendedAsOf: Choose a starting date/time and ending date/time, then pick a Program/Division/Organization
AttendanceHistory.CheckInByDate: Searches by Date Range, can do # times visited greater than, less than, etc.

Contributions.TopMessage: Must have Finance role in order to get results for searches relating to actual contributions.
Contributions.EnvelopeOptionsId: Select an Envelope Option from the list.
Contributions.ContributionOptionsId: Select a Contribution Option from the list.
Contributions.RecentContributionCount: Enter a number and select Comparison for the number of Contributions, enter the number of days to look back, enter a Fund ID (or leave blank for all funds).
Contributions.RecentContributionAmount: Enter a number and select Comparison for the Contribution Amount, enter the number of days to look back, enter a Fund ID (or leave blank for all funds).
Contributions.RecentNonTaxDedCount: Enter a number and select Comparison for the number of NonTaxDeds, enter the number of days to look back, enter a Fund ID (or leave blank for all funds).
Contributions.RecentNonTaxDedAmount: Enter a number and select Comparison for the NonTaxDed Amount, enter the number of days to look back, enter a Fund ID (or leave blank for all funds).
Contributions.RecentPledgeCount: Enter a number and select Comparison for the number of Pledges, enter the number of days to look back, enter a Fund ID (or leave blank for all funds).
Contributions.RecentPledgeAmount: Enter a number and select Comparison for the Pledge Amount, enter the number of days to look back, enter a Fund ID (or leave blank for all funds).
Contributions.ContributionAmount2: Enter a number and select Comparison for the Contribution Amount, enter a Fund ID (or leave blank for all funds), pick a date range.
Contributions.ContributionChange: Enter a number for the percentage (without the % sign) and select a Comparison (ex. 120), pick a date range.
Contributions.RecentGivingAsPctOfPrevious: Enter a number for the percentage (without the % sign) and select a Comparison (ex. 120), enter a number of days for the midpoint to look back.
Contributions.RecentHasIndContributions: Enter a number of days to look back and specify True or False.
Contributions.RecentFirstTimeGiver: Enter a number of days to look back, enter a Fund ID (or leave blank for all funds) and specify True or False.
Contributions.IsTopGiver: Enter a number of days to look back, enter the top number (ex. 100 for the top 100 givers) and specify True or False.
Contributions.IsTopPledger: Enter a number of days to look back (must include the date the pledge was made), enter the top number (ex. 100 for the top 100 pledgers) and specify True or False.
Contributions.HasManagedGiving: Specify True or False for those with Managed Giving.

ExtraValues.Title: Extra Values
ExtraValues.PeopleExtra: Select the Extra Value Code from the list
ExtraValues.PeopleExtraData: Enter the Field Name and enter all or part of the value along with a Comparison.
ExtraValues.PeopleExtraDate: Enter the Field Name and pick a date and a Comparison.
ExtraValues.PeopleExtraInt: Enter the Field Name and enter all or part of the value (must be an integer) along with a Comparison.
ExtraValues.HasPeopleExtraField: Enter the Field Name and a Comparison.

Miscellaneous.IncludeDeceased: Specify True or False to include deceased people in your query. (By default, deceased are not included.)
Miscellaneous.ParentsOf: Specify True or False to include only Primary Adults.
Miscellaneous.StatusFlag: Select Status Flags from the list (computed in nightly batch from saved searches).
Miscellaneous.HasCurrentTag: Specify True or False for those who are in your Active Tag.
Miscellaneous.OtherPreviousChurch: Select a Comparison and enter all or part of a Previous Church name.
Miscellaneous.OtherNewChurch: Select a Comparison and enter all or part of a New Church name.
Miscellaneous.HasMemberDocs: Specify True or False for those with uploaded Membership Documents.
Miscellaneous.EntryPointId: Select Entry Point from the list.
Miscellaneous.OriginId: Select Record Origin from the list.
Miscellaneous.InterestPointId: Select Interest Point from the list.
Miscellaneous.MemberAnyChurch: Specify True or False for those with this box checked on their Growth tab.
Miscellaneous.SavedQuery: Select a Saved Search from the list and specify True or False.
Miscellaneous.RecActiveOtherChurch: Specify True or False for those who indicated during an online registration that they attend another church.
Miscellaneous.RecInterestedCoaching: Specify True or False for those who indicated during an online registration that they (or their parents) are interested in coaching.
Miscellaneous.InOneOfMyOrgs: Specify True or False for those enrolled in organizations in which you are enrolled.
Miscellaneous.CheckInVisits: Enter a number of visits along with a Comparison for guests who used Building Checkin.
Miscellaneous.MedicalLength: Enter a number of characters and select a Comparison.

Admin.UserRole: Select User Role from the list.
Admin.IsUser: Specify True or False for those with user accounts.
Admin.CreatedBy: Enter a Comparison and all or part of a Last Name (or Last Name, a comma and a First Name).
Admin.CreatedDate: Select a Comparison and pick a date.
Admin.RecentCreated: Enter a number of days to look back and Specify True or False.
Admin.IsCurrentPerson: Specify True or False for person last viewed (used internally, but you can use it if you find a need for it)
Admin.DuplicateEmails: Specify True or False for records with the same email.
Admin.DuplicateNames: Specify True or False for records with the same First and Last Name.
Admin.HasLowerName: Specify True or False for records with First or Last name starting with a lowercase letter.
Admin.PeopleIds: Enter People ID numbers separated by a comma.
Admin.MatchAnything: This condition is always true (used internally).
Admin.HasOptoutsForEmail: Enter email address (leave value blank for any optout address) and pick an end date for those who opted out before that date (or leave date blank).
Admin.MeetingId: For internal use, but you can enter a Meeting ID number for those who attended.
Admin.RegisteredForMeetingId: For internal use, but you can enter a Meeting ID number for those who are registered to attend.
Admin.PeopleId: For internal use, but you can enter a People ID number.
